articles.author: Nick Cawley
articles.title: US Dollar Slumps After Inflation Eases Further - Stocks, Gold, and Silver Rally - DailyFX
articles.description: The US dollar fell sharply after the latest US CPI data showed inflation easing by more than forecast. US stocks and gold are rallying into the US open.
